properties.areaDesc: Bighorn Canyon; Southern Big Horn; Red Lodge Foothills
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 9:47AM MST until February 10 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Occasional snow showers. Total snow accumulations since
Sunday evening of 2 to locally 5 inches.

* WHERE...Red Lodge Foothills, Bighorn Canyon and Southern Big
Horn.

* WHEN...Until noon MST today.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and areas of very
poor visibility. This includes travel on US-212 near Red Lodge,
I-90 near Lodge Grass and Aberdeen Hill, and Highway 313 from
Saint Xavier to Fort Smith.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Scattered snow showers will produce
rapidly fluctuating visibilities through the afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY
